thread.title: Lovely hotel very well situated
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel very well situated - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: polchenLuxembourg
title: Lovely hotel very well situated
text: First time at Hotel Duo, I was very well surprised in a positive way. Very friendly staff, helpfull etc. Typical (small ;-) parisian rooms with nice decoration. After a small incident in my first room, I got another at once without any problems. The hotel has a big advantage: It is located at 2 feet from BHV.Store. The Hotel has one disadvantage: It is located at 2 feet from BHV.Store ;-) I'll go back
